languages.text: Поверхность долго и упорно царапали: десятки линий хаотично пересекают друг друга под разными углами без какой бы то ни было последовательности или смысла.
The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.
languages.original_text: Поверхность долго и упорно царапали: десятки линий хаотично пересекают друг друга под разными углами без какой бы то ни было последовательности или смысла.

traits.locale_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.
The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.
The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.
The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

languages.text: 它的表面布满了用力划下的痕迹。有人在上面刻下了几十道划痕，这些划痕以不同的角度混乱地交错在一起，没有任何逻辑与秩序可言。
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

traits.locale_text: 它的表面布满了用力划下的痕迹。有人在上面刻下了几十道划痕，这些划痕以不同的角度混乱地交错在一起，没有任何逻辑与秩序可言。

languages.text: La superficie muestra las marcas de un esfuerzo decidido y constante: muestra numerosos arañazos que se cruzan en toda clase de ángulos sin ton ni son.
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

traits.locale_text: La superficie muestra las marcas de un esfuerzo decidido y constante: muestra numerosos arañazos que se cruzan en toda clase de ángulos sin ton ni son.

languages.text: その表面には、決意のこもった長期にわたる努力の跡が刻まれている。何者かが無数の傷を付け、それらはさまざまな角度で無秩序に交差しており、秩序も論理もない。
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

traits.locale_text: その表面には、決意のこもった長期にわたる努力の跡が刻まれている。何者かが無数の傷を付け、それらはさまざまな角度で無秩序に交差しており、秩序も論理もない。

languages.text: Die Oberfläche zeigt das Ergebnis entschlossener und langfristiger Bemühungen: Jemand hat Dutzende von Kratzern verursacht, die sich in verschiedenen Winkeln chaotisch schneiden, ohne jede Ordnung oder Logik.
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

traits.locale_text: Die Oberfläche zeigt das Ergebnis entschlossener und langfristiger Bemühungen: Jemand hat Dutzende von Kratzern verursacht, die sich in verschiedenen Winkeln chaotisch schneiden, ohne jede Ordnung oder Logik.

languages.text: La surface porte les stigmates d'un effort résolu et prolongé : quelqu'un a fait des dizaines de lacérations qui se croisent sous différents angles de façon chaotique, sans ordre ni logique.
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.

traits.locale_text: La surface porte les stigmates d'un effort résolu et prolongé : quelqu'un a fait des dizaines de lacérations qui se croisent sous différents angles de façon chaotique, sans ordre ni logique.

languages.text: Bu yüzey, kararlı ve uzun süren bir emeğin izlerini taşıyor: Birisi; hiçbir düzene veya mantığa uymayan, kaotik bir şekilde farklı açılarda kesişen onlarca çizik atmış.
languages.original_text: The surface bears the marks of determined and protracted effort: someone made dozens of scratches, which chaotically intersect at different angles without any order or logic.
